title: What changes have occurred in what people print on their visiting cards since the days before the internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think the structure remains more or less the same but the biggest game-changer is the QR code.  QR code printed on the shirt they are wearing. You can just scan and save the information on your phone. Then there are cards with keywords for the Facebook page, Twitter, Instagram. But I don't think it is a great way because it is not digital enough.

In those days say in 7os 80s Visiting cards were with very few people.Only the name and landline Noamd Address were there. In 90s situation has become far better.Name,Land line No. Office Fax No and in some cases Email address. Only after 200pin addition to other details Mobile numbers were added. after 2010 Whatsapp numbers are being included.
